text: Cromwell at Windsor Castle is an 1828 painting by Eugène Delacroix, now in the Galerie Hans, a private collection in Hamburg. It shows Oliver Cromwell at Windsor Castle, meditating on a portrait of Charles I. ==References== category:Paintings by Eugène Delacroix category:1828 paintings category:Cultural depictions of Oliver Cromwell
title: Cromwell at Windsor Castle
